import React from 'react' import Card from '../UI/Card' import './style.css' import blogPost from '../../data/blogdata.json' const Sidebar = (props) => { const [post, setPost]=useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ const postId= props.match.params.postId; const post= blogPost.data.find(post => post.id == postId); setPost(post); }, post); return(
